title: Electricutioner

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You will receive a target at the beginning of the game. This player must have basic defense
-Zapping a player will redirect them to your target. This goes through redirection immunity
-You will learn the exact role of your target
-You cannot zap your target directly
-You have an electric fence that will stop all visitors, unless they have powerful defense or higher. Protective roles do not count to this defense
-If your target visits you, they lose their defense. You will learn that they visited you
-If your target dies by anything but your zapped target, you reroll into any other electricity-bases role and gain all abilities and attributes of said role, including wincon
-If you win, you may deal an Unstoppable attack to 2 people. You may choose to attack both in one night, or one person each night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Control an attacker into your target and have them die
